# Height

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class            | Support        |
| ---------------- | -------------- |
| `h-{n}`          | ✅ Full Support |
| `h-[n]`          | ✅ Full Support |
| `h-full`         | ✅ Full Support |
| `h-screen`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `h-auto`         | 🌐 Web only    |
| `h-min`          | 🌐 Web only    |
| `h-max`          | 🌐 Web only    |
| `h-fit`          | 🌐 Web only    |
